name: SurpriseEventPlanningCountdown
0:
”Alexa, open The Package Arrives”
”Alexa, start The Package Arrives”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the package arrives
des:
Planning a surprise party or event can be very stressful and a simple reminder of how many days you have left to plan might help relieve some of that stress. 

Just ask Alexa to open THE PACKAGE ARRIVES, give Alexa the date of the party or event and it becomes THE PACKAGE. 

Add this SKILL to the end of a daily routine to end your routine with a friendly reminder of how many days until THE PACKAGE ARRIVES. 

Although this skill will not help you to find the perfect cake or decoration (there is probably one out there that does) hopefully it will at least make you smile once a day. 
Enjoy, and I hope your party or event is FANTASTIC! 
This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
